relation: New traditional Mahjongg for four players
Load SGF games from command line and register to mimetype 'application/x-go-sgf'
Replace with Kolf 2 (help on coding and artwork desired)
Merge the patch by Sean D'Epagnier to implement many features like map editing
Add keyboard controls to allow playing without a mouse.

Create a new LibKCardGame from KPat's card scene logic. It is a private library for SC 4.5, but the intention is to make it generic, stable and friendly enough for use in other card games in a future release.
rewrite AI code or at least correct most problems related in bug #170777. Volunteers wanted!
Re-write computer player, make it act faster and more intelligent
Add more types of boards: hexagonal, triangular
Adapt view to show information provided by engine
Optimize size of puzzle files in default collection (temporarily fixed for this release cycle with an awful hack)
Introduce handicap as a means to configure difficulty
Implement puzzle piles to organize pieces
Rewrite puzzle table mouse interaction stack
